## HighlightedFieldDataPath type

Denotes the path to the field data on the Result's raw data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HighlightedFieldDataPath = {
    mappingType: 'HIGHLIGHTED_FIELD';
    apiName: string | string[];
};
```
